Magic
Spell Slots: K0: 4; K5: 2; S0: 2; S1: 1 Attack: K: 5; S: 5 Spell DC: K: 13; S: 13
Spells:
Bane (K1 [Thief Of Five Fates] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (Charisma neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Dream (K5 Illu): Touched communicates via dreams of known target
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 2 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Light (S0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Magic Missile (S1 Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Polymorph (K4 [Sculptor Of Flesh] Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Prestidigitation (K0 Tran): R10' Self performs minor magic effects for 1 hr
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Scrying (K5 Divi): Self sees and hears chosen target (Wisdom neg) for conc or 10 min
True Strike (K0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 5 selections
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 S0 spells/May cast 1 S1 spell/long rest
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Pact Of The Blade: May use an action to conjure a magic weapon or use a 1 hr ritual to make a magic weapon summonable
Sculptor Of Flesh: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Polymorph 1/long rest
Thief Of Five Fates: May use a warlock spell slot to cast Bane 1/long rest
